description: Descubre los mejores hoteles en Nelly Bay, Australia. Encuentra ofertas exclusivas y alojamientos de lujo.

hotels.title: Magnetic Island Resort Overlooking the Coral Sea with Onsite Restaurant & Two Pools
hotels.description: Succumb to the attraction of Queensland's Magnetic Island, staying in this harbourfront retreat, perfectly positioned to explore the island's national parks teeming with native wildlife and hiking trails. Dine on fresh seafood at the onsite Boardwalk Restaurant & Bar, or take a short stroll to the bustling Nelly Bay, brimming with eateries, and experience the magic of the Great Barrier Reef. Finally, relax by the two resort swimming pools and indulge in a lavish treatment at the onsite spa.

seo.title: Hoteles en Nelly Bay - Australia Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
seo.description: Encuentra los mejores hoteles en Nelly Bay, Australia con ofertas exclusivas. Reserva tu escapada perfecta con hasta 60% de descuento.
